commands.name: Gen SRS from TC
commands.description: Generate Software Requirements Specification from Truth Criteria
commands.command: Generate SRS document in /requirements/SRS.md based on /truth/TC.vX.md. Ensure all requirements are traceable with derived-from tags.

commands.name: Expand BR from SRS
commands.description: Expand Business Requirements from Software Requirements Specification
commands.command: Generate Business Requirements document in /requirements/BR.md based on /requirements/SRS.md. Maintain traceability with origin tags.

commands.name: Gen Flows from BR
commands.description: Generate User Flows and Process Flows from Business Requirements
commands.command: Generate flow diagrams and descriptions in /design/flows/ based on /requirements/BR.md. Include user journeys and process flows.

commands.name: Gen ERD from Flows + BR
commands.description: Generate Entity Relationship Diagram from Flows and Business Requirements
commands.command: Generate ERD in /architecture/ERD.md based on /design/flows/ and /requirements/BR.md. Extract entities, relationships, and attributes.

commands.name: Gen API from ERD
commands.description: Generate API specifications from Entity Relationship Diagram
commands.command: Generate API specifications in /backend/api/ or /architecture/API.md based on /architecture/ERD.md. Design REST/GraphQL endpoints.

commands.name: Gen Frontend Component from ComponentContract
commands.description: Generate Frontend Component code from Component Contract
commands.command: Generate React/React Native component in /frontend/components/ based on Component Contract. Include props, state, and behavior as specified.
